description:
A compact and cost-effective way to meet legal requirements, and a device with real-world application for sea kayaking safety. The Micro has the same bag style as the Northwater regular tow line but is about 2/3 the size. It’s a waist-worn system with a pre-set but adjustable short or long tow.

  • 15m (50ft) of 6.35mm line
  • Two wide-gate stainless steel carabiners anchored on either side for immediate access. Unclip one for a short tow, unclip both for a long tow
  • Meets Canadian Coast Guard Regulations for a buoyant heaving line
name: North Water Micro Tow Line
